# startSpotlightIndexing()

**Instance Method**

Starts the indexing of the store’s entities.

## Declaration

```swift
func startSpotlightIndexing()
```

## Discussion

After you call this method, the delegate posts a notification whenever the index changes. The type of notification is [doc://com.apple.coredata/documentation/CoreData/NSCoreDataCoreSpotlightDelegate/indexDidUpdateNotification], and its `userInfo` dictionary contains the keys [doc://com.apple.coredata/documentation/CoreData/NSStoreUUIDKey] and [doc://com.apple.coredata/documentation/CoreData/NSPersistentHistoryTokenKey].

## Managing the Index

- **attributeSet(for:)**: Returns the searchable attributes for the specified managed object.
- **deleteSpotlightIndex(completionHandler:)**: Deletes all searchable items from the configured index.
- **stopSpotlightIndexing()**: Stops the indexing of the store’s entities.
